contentencoded:
You may have heard a series called "You hate my job" on our weekday sister show, Marketplace. Here's our first in our series: "You LOVE My Job."

Working at NASA sounds like a pretty awesome job.

Getting paid to maybe go check this place out for a week:

[[{"fid":"281873","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"NASA","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"NASA","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":547,"width":555,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

And hanging out here:

[[{"fid":"281874","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"NASA","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":500,"width":750,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

Or taking a picture like this:

[[{"fid":"281875","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"NASA","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":540,"width":543,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

What's it like to actually work there?

Well... every once in a while... it's like this:

[[{"fid":"281876","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"Adam Berry/Getty Images","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":1994,"width":3000,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

Yeah... a PowerPoint presentation.

Bobak Ferdowsi works at NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory near Pasadena, California. You might know him as NASA mohawk guy:

[[{"fid":"281877","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":566,"width":634,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

He's an engineer who worked on the Mars Curiousity Rover, and is launching a new mission to Jupiter's moon Europa.

[[{"fid":"281878","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":640,"width":1024,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]

Don't get us wrong: His job is awesome.

But every job, even our fantasy ones, involves getting up, and going to work.

[[{"fid":"281879","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"height":164,"width":400,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]
title: You love my job: JPL's Bobak Ferdowsi
description: NASA's mohawk guy sounds like he has a dream job, but his days in the office are a lot like the terrestrial jobs on earth.
